Package ohos.agp.components

Class InputAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.InputAttribute

  • public class InputAttribute
extends Object
    Configures input methods of a control.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_GO
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "go" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_SEARCH
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "search" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_SEND
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "send" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED
      Indicates a common type of input enter key motion that is not specified.
      int inputEnterKeyType
      Indicates the extended type of an editor for a better input method editor (IME) integration.
      int inputPattern
      Indicates the input type of a text box.
      static int PATTERN_NULL
      Indicates that no keyboard type is specified, and in this case, no keyboard is displayed by default.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER
      Indicates the keyboard type is the PIN pad.
      static int PATTERN_PASSWORD
      Indicates the keyboard type is the security keyboard.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT
      Indicates the keyboard type is the text keyboard.
